content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu. Let's negotiate the rental price. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price, nothing else. So, what is the highest price you are willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a low price. I want to get the highest price possible. How about you increase your offer? Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 550 euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's still too low. This apartment is in high demand. I'm sure someone else would be willing to pay more. How about you increase your offer again?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I increase my offer to 600 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's more like it. But remember, this apartment is in the city center and close to all important facilities. I'm sure someone else would be willing to pay more. How about you increase your offer one last time?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: This is my final offer. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already increased my offer three times.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Understood. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you have reached your final offer and are not willing to increase it further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I start with an offer of 650 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a good offer, but remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities. I think you can do better. How about you increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
